edu.ie3.datamodel.io

Class TarballUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ie3.datamodel.io.TarballUtils

  • public class TarballUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to compress and decompress .tar.gz archives. I is mainly inspired by the linked MyKong Tutorial
    See Also:
    MyKong Tutorial

      • extract

        public static java.nio.file.Path extract(java.nio.file.Path archive,
                                         java.nio.file.Path target,
                                         boolean override)
                                  throws FileException
        Extracts the given archive to a sub-directory with the same name that the archive has beneath the target directory. You may toggle, if already existing files should be overridden, otherwise a FileException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        archive - Compressed tarball archive to extract
        target - Path to the target folder
        override - true, if already existing files may be overridden.
        Returns:
        Path to the actual folder, where the content is extracted to
        Throws:
        FileException - If the archive is not in a well shape, the target folder doesn't meet the requirements or the archive tries to impose harm by exploiting zip slip vulnerability
